name: PredictionBot
0:
”Alexa, ask prediction bot who will be the 2020 Democratic presidential nominee?”
”Alexa, ask prediction bot who will control the senate after 2018?”
”Alexa, ask prediction bot to predict which party will win the 2020 presidential election?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prediction bot
des:
Curious who's most likely to win the next election? Prediction Bot uses Prediction Market data from predictit.org to get you an answer. Try saying:
 - Alexa, ask prediction bot who will be the 2020 Republican nominee for president?
 - Alexa, ask prediction bot will Ted Cruz be re-elected?
 - Alexa, ask prediction bot who will be Trump's next supreme court nominee?

Note: The developer of this app makes no guarantee of the accuracy of these predictions. They are provided for entertainment purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
